Reviews.Title: “Value for money? Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: MDI256
Reviews.Content: First of all, this hotel has a great location, in just 10 minutes by foot you can arrive to the Blue mosque and Hagia Sophia, Basilica Cistern..etc., which is one of the important thing tourists are searching for when they're planning their trip. The rooms are very tidy, clean and the towels are changed daily. Rooms aren't huge, but after all, if you need a huge room, you should better stay at the Hilton..:):) The breakfast is also nice and the food is tasty. The staff is great, always ready for any kind of questions, nice and helpful. All in all, a veeery reasonable price for a great stay! Apsolutely recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, A Few Quirks”
Reviews.Author: Pinnman
Reviews.Content: Very convenient to all Istanbul sights. A/C and refrigerator not quite up to par. Clean, very small room.

Reviews.Title: “great place for a little getaway!”
Reviews.Author: Jenz_nottm
Reviews.Content: i recently stayed at this hotel with my friend january 2012 and we were amazed at how clean and nicely decorated the rooms were. great location, easy to get to main attractions and especially tram stop Cemberlitas which you can get to kabatas then underground to taksim. like under a 10 minute walk to blue mosque, hagia sophia and grand bazaar and also to starbucks! Mini-bar in room reasonably priced. Some rooms dont have a view its just a matter of what you get. On my next visit to istanbul i would definatly be considering to returning to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great value/great location”
Reviews.Author: Verzen
Reviews.Content: Perfect location. Just around corner from main street ( tram station ) 10 minutes walking to blue mosque and Hagia Sofia.... Helpfull staff, great clean rooms and nice breakfast. Great value for veeery reasonable price. Recomended!

Reviews.Title: “Great location/great price”
Reviews.Author: BostonArthur
Reviews.Content: Clean quiet budget hotel. This was my second visit and I stayed 22 days this time. I hope to return. Helpful staff. Clean rooms. Turkish breakfast. Easy walking distance to historic sites and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Travel_and_Living30
Reviews.Content: Cosy hotel at a great location.... right at the centre of Sultanahmet area. 2 mins walk from Cemberlitas tram station. All the main attractions in the old part of the city area are just few mins walk away. Room was cleaned and towels were changed daily. Breakfast menu was pretty basic and was not changed (for the five days I stayed). Staff were warm and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel, full breakfast, clean, great location”
Reviews.Author: Maria B
Reviews.Content: we stayed for 2 nights, great low budget hotel, nice room , the breakfast was full, very clean, the staff very helpful and all the famous monuments in walking distance..

Reviews.Title: “Bad place”
Reviews.Author: ahmedmohamed
Reviews.Content: small street , no Taxi driver khnow the place , no view , small room.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: MDoumit
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel, nice stuff , but bad breakfast.great location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Safe Location”
Reviews.Author: DEBAND56
Reviews.Content: After reading critical reviews of many boutique hotels in Old Istanbul I thought I would provide some insight into this type of hotel. These are not five star lavish hotels they are basically converted homes and if you look at it as if you are renting out a bedroom then these critiques are completely false. We stayed in the California Hotel and found the accomodations clean adequate and a great value. We talked to numerous tourist who stayed at other hotels in the area, paying double what we did having horrible experiences. The staff at the California were polite, helpful and very kind. The breakfast was typical Turkish, bread, boiled eggs and some vegtables. The location was absolutely amazing- we took the metro from the airport for under $5 US as it was only a block from the Cemberitas station. We walked to all the historic sights and even visited the Grand Bazaar the morning we checked out- yes it was only a few blocks away. This is a perfect place in a safe, clean neighborhood with a wonderful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel with some lovely guys!!”
Reviews.Author: nah1984
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel over 10 nights and for the amount i paid it was well worth it. Our rooms were generally very clean and towels were changed everyday. Any problems were dealt with efficiently. Location is superb as it gives you easy access to the trams, shops and bazaar. Staff were lovely, the guys were very helpful and answered all questions. Very polite people. Well done guys...keep up the good job. I would definately go back and book the same hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very bad hotel”
Reviews.Author: ahmedmohamed
Reviews.Content: Very poor place, no taxi driver know the hotel place, you will lose a lot of time to found , no view , no windows only you can see back of hotel,

Reviews.Title: “Irresponsability and lies”
Reviews.Author: albertogemal
Reviews.Content: I did a booking in this hotel three months in advance but 10 days before travelling they declined my reserve. The same reserve accepted by them in January. They declined alleging Credit Card reasons, the same credit card that I used through the same trip to pay my bills in ADVANCE in the same country. What a shame and irresponsability! I had to find other hotel in a big haste. It caused me lots of unnecessary stress. Hope you don't have to go through this kind of trouble.

Reviews.Title: “Dishonest hotel that would not honour our (written) reservation”
Reviews.Author: Neil3782
Reviews.Content: After booking the hotel at an agreed rate, the hotel cancelled the booking and requested that we re-book at a much higher rate. Despite having all the documentation for the original agreed rate, they would not honour the agreement. If there is an opportunity for them to make more money with someone else, you can find yourself very quickly without a room here.

Reviews.Title: “Our home in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: ahmed_usif1
Reviews.Content: we like the Location of Hotel California too much , the hotel is new , the Staff especialy Soner in Hotel California is very frienldy and polite , the street is very calm and beautiful , breakfast is rich , best Hotel for young couples , Check-in and Check-out including transfer were very fast- good value for Money Just suggestions : to provide more bath amenties like Slippers , bathrobes , shower caps but even without all these the room is very good

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for not too much money”
Reviews.Author: Sonia2u2
Reviews.Content: I was there with my husband this month the room was good it was for 3 persons then after 4 nights they asked us to change the room to a double it was ok but there were to much noise and the last night there were new turkish guests they speak very loud but in general the stuff were nice next time i will reserve triple room in 4th floor thanks osner and the others . Note i wish if you add any fruit to the breakfast Nacer&Sonia

Reviews.Title: “Great value Teriffic location”
Reviews.Author: arthurboston
Reviews.Content: We stayed 14 days in this hotel. Modern,clean,quiet,well located . Easy to see all the sights and to enjoy the night life from this location.

Reviews.Title: “Great place but beware”
Reviews.Author: Dan1977p
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Clean rooms, super friendly staff. Free wifi, breakfast and tv. Is in a perfect location and you will feel safe. A word of warning though. If you walk out of the hotel and go left, then left again you will see a restaurant on the right. It is called Saray. DO NOT GO THERE. They will agree on an inflated price then charge you more. They did it to us and a few other tourists. Beware. They are bad bad people. Other than them the rest of the area is beautiful and friendly. The hotel is great budget accommodation. Stay away from Saray Kebap

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: maria_gr79
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel for it's category. Clean, friendly and helpful stuff, quiet, just round the corner of a metro stop, nice colors, nice bed, well taken care of, good atmosphere. Highly recommended! I would give it an extra star if i could!

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: biatazdz
Reviews.Content: The hotel is really basic but you can't expect luxury for this price. It's a new hotel and you can notice it easily - new furniture, tiles on walls in a bathroom, doors etc.The rooms are cleaned every day, inlcuding the change of towels. My room was small and without a window which was a minus. I felt weird after waking up in the morning . I didn't know that I would get a dark room and I was very surprised on my coming to the hotel. When I was booking a room on the internet, the manager offered me a discount (it was nice) but he did not inform me that the room would be without a window. I'd rather have known about such a disadvantage beforehand. The breakfast was basic, the same every day. The dining room was small but neat and clean. The staff was very nice and helpful, always smiling and communicative. The hotel is located 10 minutes away from the main sights and just a few steps from the tram stop. The neighbourhood is safe and quiet, you can walk there without fear at night. To sum up: a decent hotel for this price, simply for people who don't want to spend too much (travelleres on a tight budget) and who treat a hotel just like a place to sleep. My tip: if you reserve a room, ask about one with a window.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty bathroom and poor service”
Reviews.Author: IntlGAPeach
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed in Hotel California with a friend. We arrived at the hotel around 11 AM after a LONG overnight ride bus ride from Cappadocia. We were told that they were waiting for the guests in our room to check out and that it shouldn't be a long wait. They were gracious enough at that point to at least serve breakfast to us even though it was after the normal time. After waiting for about two hours we asked them if it was possible to get into our room again and they said they were still waiting for the check out. Then one of the front desk workers came over and told us that it would just be a few more minutes - that the guests in our room had finally checked out and they needed to clean the room. Cut to about 20 minutes later and they still were working on it and they were now trying to fix a problem with the hair dryer. My friend and I told them that the hair dryer wasn't important to us we just wanted to get into our room and shower at this point! We pushed and they finally took us up to our room. Two gentleman were still working on the hair dryer and we urged them to hurry and finish - which they quickly did. After they left I wanted to use the toilet and opened the lid to see urine splashed all over the seat. I freaked out a little and then opened the door and asked the housekeeper (who didn't speak English) to clean it up. She came in quickly wiped down the toiled and quickly mopped the floor (there was hair from the previous guests on the floor). Afterwards I took a shower and noticed that it hadn't been cleaned yet either. Again hair from the previous guests and their old shower gel bottle was still on the top. When we left the hotel after our showers we asked them to have the cleaning lady to re-clean our bathroom. We arrived that evening and our bathrooms had NOT been re-cleaned. We mentioned again twice to the front desk workers and they offered no real apologies and just sort of shrugged their shoulders about the matter. I WILL NEVER STAY AT THIS HOTEL AGAIN - it was one of the worst hotel experiences I've had on this trip - so dirty! If it weren't for the whole dirty bathroom issue and their lack of response my stay at this hotel would have been ok. So disappointing.

Reviews.Title: “I don't like rooms without windows!”
Reviews.Author: DianaRiga_Latvia
Reviews.Content: The location of that hotel is pretty central. Hotel is rather new also, but despite that fact, some things in bathroom were broken already, no shelves at all. Breakfast rather poor. And the fact I didnt like most - when I opened window, about after 30 cm there is another wall, no dayligt and that made to feel depressive a lil bit. But staff is very polite and kind :) Good value for that money.

Reviews.Title: “Very good service and just a walk away from the touristic centre”
Reviews.Author: battalk
Reviews.Content: If you want a cheap, nice and clean stay this would be a very good option. Normally I stay at a more expensive hotel nearby, but this is with is price-quality my choice for Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “fully recommend for this price!!!!”
Reviews.Author: koilitsa
Reviews.Content: We felt very comfortable at the Hotel California with our four-day stay. When we claimed our room (because of the stench ventilation) immediately offered a new one. The breakfast was not very rich, but totally okay. The employees are very courteous, helpful and hospitable. The rooms were clean, the style of the rooms is a matter of taste. The hotel is situated in a quiet street near the central attractions.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel California Istanbul
HotelInfo.Address: Eminsinan Mahallesi Gedikpasa Camii Sokak No : 55, Istanbul 34126, Turkey
